CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 9, 1961, page A12 reads: "Cha-Cha-Cha - Vivian Kizee, Phyllis Pitts and Evelyn Anderson show you how the popular dance 'Cha-Cha-Cha' should be done. The chorus line made four appearances, complete with colorful costume changes." Headline reads: "Over 500 Attend Junior Mothers' 'Smart Affairs of 1961'"
TitMainTitle: Vivian Kizee, Phyllis Pitts, and Evelyn Anderson wearing dance costumes with ruffles around sleeves and skirt, in Horizon room with leaf patterned carpet and marble baseboards for the Junior Mothers' "Smart Affairs of 1961"
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Dance costume--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Kizee, Vivian.Pitts, Phyllis.Anderson, Evelyn.
